idea:
DestaGlobal was started in 2011 as a social impact organization. The objective, to work on the Agri. input distribution and make a wide portfolio of products available to the farmers at the right price point. During the first phase, the organization bought products from Ag Manufacturers, stocked in the warehouses to distribute it to Ag-dealers registered with the company. In 2013, the organization launched its own products and started selling those through the existing distribution network.
Early in 2015, we realized the limitations of the current model. the impact that was to be made in the Indian Agriculture sector was still far away. Technology, as the experts said was the future and we agreed. So, in June 2015, we launched a B2B E-commerce portal for Agri- inputs, connecting the Ag Manufactures with the Dealers in Maharashtra (- DestaMart); So as to also be relevant to the Farmers, an Agri. info portal “DestaTalk” was launched to bring awareness about the ever-growing Agriculture -products & new technology among farmers in May 2015.
The next two years Desta team worked on building a good network of farmers (2.5 Lakhs), Ag- manufacturers (130+) & Ag-dealers (6000+) using online and offline mediums to provide Agri-inputs at the right time and right price.
In the later part of 2017 we built a robust CRM system to capture the Market data and to bring in excellence in the consumer facing functions, Sales – BD and Call Centre teams. Our field teams use mobile application to report work.
We know the smartphone usage in rural has exponentially increased in the last few years. It is the right time to connect with the Farmers and the Dealers via a mobile application.
name: DestaGlobal

idea:
Agriculture mobile application will contain 8 different platforms to serve agriculture community as follows:
1) AgroInDaily: Daily agriculture news for agriculture community on various current topics to update them.
2) AgroInFriend: Fixed agriculture related data can be accessible anytime e.g. various Crops Information, farm animal’s information, agro related business etc.
3) AgroInMall: classifieds of agriculture products and services to farmers. E.g. Fertilizers. Pesticides, equipment's etc.
4) AgroInBazzar: Farmers market where farmers can sell their produce.
5) AgroInLink: local search to farmers e.g. agriculture retailers, consultant, veterinary doctors.
6) AgroInDeal: This is for agriculture micro, small and medium enterprises where they can list and sell their products to consumers.
7) AgroInFin: listing of agriculture related financial products e.g. agriculture loans, micro finance, agriculture insurance etc.
8) AgroIndeed: listing of agriculture jobs to agriculture professional.
name: AgroIn Technology Solutions

idea:
Loans4SME is an alternative lending platform that connects businesses with debt providers. As a curated marketplace that has built a large network of lenders and innovative debt products, Loans4SME is expanding the source of domestic debt capital for SMEs beyond banks, to include venture debt funds, impact lenders and family investment offices.
By utilizing a credit risk assessment module that incorporates a wide range of data elements as compared to traditional credit scoring mechanisms, Loans4SME focuses on cash flows and the repayment capabilities of the SMEs in order to increase investor confidence and offers timelier financing when compared to traditional lending.
name: AURUS LENDING SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
